description: Enterprise techniques used by Nltest, ATT&CK software S0359 v1.0
name: Nltest (S0359)

techniques.comment: Nltest may be used to enumerate trusted domains by using commands such as nltest /domain_trusts.[1][2]
Nltest may be used to enumerate remote domain controllers using options such as /dclist and /dsgetdc.[1]
Nltest may be used to enumerate the parent domain of a local machine using /parentdomain.[1]
